
JSP Elements/Tags:
-------------------
1. Scriplet  
<%  here any java code which go to the jspService()  %>



hello.jsp

Web Container/Tomcat server

//Auto Generated servlet
class   Hello_Servlet   extends HttpServlet{

	
		jspInit(){

		}

		jspService(request,response){

				HttpSession session;
				PrintWriter out;
				ServletConfig config;
				
		out.print("Hello friends");

		out.print("<h1>WELCOME TO JSP</h1>");


		
		int x =100;

		out.print(session);


		}

		jspDestroy(){



		}



}
